description: Resolves manual controls for platform team structure, IaC pipelines, and landing zone vending.

questions.text: Is there a cross-functional DevOps Platform Team responsible for building, managing, and maintaining the landing zone?
Are the functions for the Azure Landing Zone Platform team clearly defined and documented?
Are application workload teams defined and enabled to be self-sufficient (no platform team bottleneck for day-to-day operations)?
Is a CI/CD pipeline used to deploy IaC artifacts with quality gates (linting, plan review, approval)?

What is the maturity of your Infrastructure-as-Code practice?
  1 = No IaC â€” portal/CLI deployments
  2 = IaC templates exist but deployed manually
  3 = Fully automated IaC pipeline with drift detection and state management
